translation: Send the government that Your Honor São João, the citizen Manuel da Silva Pacheco, if the goods seized on the “Mineira” boat exist at the Mendonça passage or in the warehouses of D. Antônia, in Barra de Camaquã, so that the wagons leaving from here to transport such goods can go directly to the place of receipt of the cargo; and this can be arranged by Your Honor Francisco Antônio Machado, who is leaving from here today with wagons for the transportation of the aforementioned goods.
